title: Microsoft Excel 2016 Formulas and Functions {{ERTB}}
description:

Becoming an Excel expert has never been easier! Youâ€™ll find crystal-clear instructions; insider insights; even complete step-by-step projects for building timesheets, projecting cash flow, aging receivables, analyzing defects, and more.

In addition, this book is part of Queâ€™s exciting Content Update Program.
